alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:48PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Caribou, east central Oneida, southeastern Bannock, Franklin and west central Bear Lake Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 448 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Swanlake, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Preston, Swanlake, Franklin, Oneida Narrows Reservoir, Clifton, Oxford, Mink Creek, Whitney, Riverdale, and Mapleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
